channel.title: Client wont connect with Server if on a different computer
channel.description: Hey guys, my private server works when im using it on my own computer. But, when i transferred the files to my other computer it doesn't work. The client loads up, but when i try to log on it says " Error Connecting to Server". im pretty sure it is because of the client.java file since i changed some things in it. It would be cool if u guys can help me. Im willing to do TeamViewer if you are not busy.
